CustomField.formula: CASE(Time_Out_Type__c, "On Hold", Registration__r.BH_OnHold__c, "Awaiting Client", Registration__r.BH_AwaitingClient__c, "Needs More Time", Registration__r.BH_NeedsMoreTime__c, "Non Responsive", Registration__r.BH_NonResponsive__c, null)
CustomField.label: Business Hours - Reg Value
